```{r}
library("lpSolveAPI")
x <- read.lp("PP_1.lp")
x
```
model name :
   a linear program with 12 decision variables and 8 constraints 
   
Now, we solve for the problem 
```{r}
solve(x)
get.objective (x)
```
```{r}
get.constraints(x)
```
```{r}
get.variables(x)
```
